Amon.name: Amon
Amon.description:
Alignment: CN (CG, CN, CE)

Siblings: Castilli

Temples: taverns, theatres, concert halls, pubs

Worshipperst: adventurers, debutants, tavern owners

Sacred Animal: squirrel

Sacred Colors: brown and gold

Domains: freedom, indulgence, luck, wealth

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pBevG6bSQOiyflev]{Befuddle}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mUz3wqbMQ5JQ06M5]{Infectious Melody}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Jvyy6oVIQsD34MHB]{Uncontrollable Dance}

Favored Weapon: flail

Divine Ability: Constitution or Charisma

Divine Skill: Performance

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: indulge yourself, take time to relax, help others have fun

Key Anathema: pressure others into indulging, ruin a party, take advantage of the intoxicated

Aoz.name: Aoz
Aoz.description:
Alignment: CN (CG, N, CN, CE)

Siblings: Zoa

Temples: nurseries, druidic circles, infirmaries

Worshipperst: physicians, midwives, druids, farmers, florists

Sacred Animal: worm

Sacred Colors: white and gray

Domains: creation, dreams, healing, sun

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K9gI08enGtmih5X1]{Protector Tree}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants}

Favored Weapon: bladed scarf

Divine Ability: Constitution or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Medicine

Divine Font: heal

Key Edicts: heal the ill, help create life, destroy undead

Key Anathema: kill a living creature intentionally, prevent life from flourishing

Awanna.name: Awanna
Awanna.description:
Alignment: N (LG, NG, CG, LN, N, CN, LE, NE, CE)

Siblings: Dremira and Herst

Temples: theaters, parks, market places, monasteries

Worshipperst: merchants, monks, performers

Sacred Animal: hummingbird

Sacred Colors: blue and brown

Domains: ambition, confidence, passion, zeal

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r8g7oSumKOHDqJsd]{Agitate}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MNiT0dHol5fEcKlz]{Threefold Aspect}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OdqM06M0wDUqZWiR]{Cast into Time}

Favored Weapon: club

Divine Ability: Constitution or Charisma

Divine Skill: Society

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: seize the day, try something new, be your best self

Key Anathema: dwell on the past, waste time, procrastinate

Baoyan.name: Baoyan
Baoyan.description:
Alignment: NE (N, LE, NE, CE)

Siblings: Thongfa, Mului, Than Dat, and Kuu

Temples: smithies, volcanoes, bakeries

Worshipperst: blacksmiths, arsonists, bakers

Sacred Animal: moth

Sacred Colors: orange and yellow

Domains: destruction, fire, magic, sun

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.y6rAdMK6EFlV6U0t]{Burning Hands}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O7ZEqWjwdKyo2CUv]{Volcanic Eruption}

Favored Weapon: warhammer

Divine Ability: Strength or Intelligence

Divine Skill: Intimidation

Divine Font: harm

Key Edicts: destroy all that opposes you, shine as brightly as possible, show no remorse

Key Anathema: douse a fire before it is finished burning, hold in your anger without lashing out, spare an enemy

Castilli.name: Castilli
Castilli.description:
Alignment: LN (LG, LN, LE)

Siblings: Amon

Temples: schools, bureaucratic offices, libraries, prisons

Worshipperst: lawmakers, guards

Sacred Animal: dog

Sacred Colors: black and blue

Domains: confidence, protection, truth, tyranny

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GP3wewkQXEPrLxYj]{Subconscious Suggestion}

Favored Weapon: bola

Divine Ability: Constitution or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Society

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: Stay levelheaded, do only what is required, minimize your risk

Key Anathema: Willingly experience a toxin or drug, break social decorum, act foolish

Chakisa.name: Chakisa
Chakisa.description:
Alignment: CN (CG, N, CN, CE)

Siblings: Wera, Kasa, and Chira

Temples: beaches, coastal dwellings, open spaces

Worshipperst: travelers, explorers, epicureans

Sacred Animal: frog

Sacred Colors: purple with white

Domains: fire, luck, sun, travel

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Longstrider}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3GXU3ugrwLv0P7AH]{Ignite Fireworks}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}

Favored Weapon: hatchet

Divine Ability: Wisdom or Charisma

Divine Skill: Performance

Divine Font: heal

Key Edicts: be kind to others, find harmony, strive for humility

Key Anathema: act impatiently, cause strife, allow cruelty to befall others

Chira.name: 奇拉 Chira
Chira.description:
阵营: NG (LG, NG, CG, N)

手足: 查基萨、维拉和卡萨

神殿: 花店，音乐厅，舞厅，花园

信徒: 花匠，浪漫主义者，媒人，音乐家

神圣动物: 兔鼠（Viscacha）

神圣颜色: 红色和黄色

领域: 创造，家庭，自由，热情

牧师法术: 1环: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{橡棍术 Shillelagh}, 4环: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D31YX7zvRBvenTAz]{风旋散花 Petal Storm}, 8环: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kWDt0JcKPgX6MvdD]{炽焰绽放 Burning Blossoms}

偏好武器: 木杖

神圣能力: 敏捷或魅力

神圣技能: 表演

神力源泉: 治疗

关键典范: 滋养生命和人际关系，不断成长，以新视角看待世界

关键禁忌: 扼杀一段关系或生物的成长，沉湎于陈旧的怨恨和错误，拒绝另一种观点

Dremira.name: Dremira
Dremira.description:
Alignment: CN (LG, NG, CG, LN, N, CN)

Siblings: Awanna and Herst

Temples: schools, bureaucratic buildings, nurseries

Worshipperst: politicians, revolutionaries, artists

Sacred Animal: raven

Sacred Colors: black and silver

Domains: cities, dreams, fate, secrecy

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MNiT0dHol5fEcKlz]{Threefold Aspect}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.y0Vy7iNL3ET8K00C]{Dreaming Potential}

Favored Weapon: hand crossbow

Divine Ability: Dexterity or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Occultism

Divine Font: heal

Key Edicts: learn a secret, invent something new, change the world

Key Anathema: Expose someone else's secret publicly, stagnate, regress

Ebrugeses.name: Ebrugeses
Ebrugeses.description:
Alignment: CN (CG, N, CN, CE)

Siblings: Havath

Temples: restaurants, pubs, theaters, farms

Worshipperst: chefs, Epicureans, farmers, tavern owners

Sacred Animal: hog

Sacred Colors: green and purple

Domains: family, indulgence, moon, wealth

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Wu0xFpewMKRK3HG8]{Grease}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.F9mA2Bg27QKniIdv]{Bottomless Stomach}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ER1LOEgCLtmEKd05]{Ravenous Portal}

Favored Weapon: greataxe

Divine Ability: Constitution or Charisma

Divine Skill: Crafting

Divine Font: heal

Key Edicts: enjoy what you have, consume your fill, partake of life's bounty with others

Key Anathema: deprive others of their own bounty, consume in moderation, dwell on what you don't have

Havath.name: Havath
Havath.description:
Alignment: CE (NE, CE)

Siblings: Ebrugeses

Temples: secret locations

Worshipperst: cultists, necromancers, undead

Sacred Animal: housefly

Sacred Colors: brown and black

Domains: death, pain, trickery, undeath

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1meVElIu1CEVYWkv]{Noxious Vapors}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.cB17yFc9456Pyfec]{Vomit Swarm}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.M0jQlpQYUr0pp2Sv]{Horrid Wilting}

Favored Weapon: club

Divine Ability: Constitution or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Survival

Divine Font: harm

Key Edicts: consume the living, embrace undeath, destroy life

Key Anathema: heal another creature, share what is yours with others, create life

Herst.name: Herst
Herst.description:
Alignment: LN (LG, LN, N, LE)

Siblings: Awanna and Dremira

Temples: colleges, libraries, ancient sites, ruins

Worshipperst: historians, scholars, librarians

Sacred Animal: owl

Sacred Colors: beige and black

Domains: knowledge, magic, protection, vigil

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TjWHgXqPv5jywMti]{Pocket Library}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MNiT0dHol5fEcKlz]{Threefold Aspect}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rsZ5c0AUyywe5yoK]{Retrocognition}

Favored Weapon: staff

Divine Ability: Intelligence or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Arcana

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: preserve the past, know your history, seek knowledge

Key Anathema: destroy records, deny historical fact, disrespect your elders

Jata.name: Jata
Jata.description:
Alignment: LG (LG, NG)

Siblings: Sewa and Sumaworo

Temples: monuments, inns, academies

Worshipperst: adventurers, guards, authors

Sacred Animal: lion

Sacred Colors: black and gold

Domains: confidence, might, protection, zeal

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.X9dkmh23lFwMjrYd]{Ant Haul}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8M03UxGXjYyDFAoy]{Weapon Storm}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.y2cQYLr5mljDSu1G]{Unrelenting Observation}

Favored Weapon: longsword

Divine Ability: Strength or Charisma

Divine Skill: Diplomacy

Divine Font: heal

Key Edicts: act with honor, protect the weak, work for the good of everyone

Key Anathema: cheat, put others in harms' way, foment chaos

Kasa.name: Kasa
Kasa.description:
Alignment: NE (LN, N, LE, NE, CE)

Siblings: Chakisa, Wera, and Chira

Temples: fortresses, outposts, lodges, schools

Worshipperst: mountaineers, survivalists, arctic inhabitants, teachers

Sacred Animal: penguin

Sacred Colors: white with purple

Domains: darkness, moon, water, undeath

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8TQiFzGf4feoHeH0]{Chilling Spray}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kHyjQbibRGPNCixx]{Ice Storm}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vFkz0gVBUT2gGnm1]{Frigid Flurry}

Favored Weapon: light pick

Divine Ability: Strength or Constitution

Divine Skill: Survival

Divine Font: harm

Key Edicts: prepare for challenges ahead, be cautious, respect the harsh cold

Key Anathema: take snow and ice for granted, run headlong into danger, leave important work undone

Kuu.name: Kuu
Kuu.description:
Alignment: N (NG, LN, N, CN, NE)

Siblings: Thongfa, Mului, Than Dat, and Baoyan

Temples: forgotten places, ruins, tombs

Worshipperst: monks, the grieving, investigators, archaeologists

Sacred Animal: bumblebee bat

Sacred Colors: black

Domains: darkness, knowledge, truth, void

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zlnXpME1T2uvn8Lr]{Pass Without Trace}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tcwT97RWKxsJiefG]{Shadow Siphon}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4WS7HrFjwNvTn8T2]{Implosion}

Favored Weapon: unarmed strike

Divine Ability: Intelligence or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Occultism

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: accept the truth, embrace the void, become the stillness

Key Anathema: deceive others, blame someone else for your own fault, remain comfortable in ignorance

Lilin.name: Lilin
Lilin.description:
Alignment: CN (CG, CN, CE)

Siblings: Unknown

Temples: art studios, scrap yards, lumberyards, workshops

Worshipperst: artists, demolitionists, performers, salvagers

Sacred Animal: butterfly

Sacred Colors: white with blue

Domains: creation, destruction, family, secrecy

Cleric Spells: 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r8g7oSumKOHDqJsd]{Agitate}, 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Creation}, 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}

Favored Weapon: fighting fan

Divine Ability: Wisdom or Charisma

Divine Skill: Crafting or Performance

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Anathema: protect institutions from change, allow yourself to stagnate, stand on the sidelines

Mului.name: Mului
Mului.description:
Alignment: LN (LG, LN, N, LE)

Siblings: Thongfa, Than Dat, Baoyan, and Kuu

Temples: harbors, sailing ships, mountain springs, waterfalls, sea caves

Worshipperst: sailors, fishers, aquatic ancestries

Sacred Animal: dolphin

Sacred Colors: blue with green

Domains: darkness, might, travel, water

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{Hydraulic Push}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.T4QKmtYPeCgYxVGe]{Crashing Wave}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Y3G6Y6EDgCY0s3fq]{Hydraulic Torrent}

Favored Weapon: trident

Divine Ability: Strength or Dexterity

Divine Skill: Athletics

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Anathema: trespass without announcing yourself and making an offering, chum waters unbidden, defy your betters unjustly

Semelleh.name: Semelleh
Semelleh.description:
Alignment: NG (LG, NG, CG, N)

Siblings: Zatera

Temples: battlefields, nature preserves, embassies

Worshipperst: diplomats, negotiators, merchants

Sacred Animal: tree sloth

Sacred Colors: white with green

Domains: freedom, healing, protection, perfection

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{Maze}

Favored Weapon: fist

Divine Ability: Wisdom or Charisma

Divine Skill: Diplomacy

Divine Font: heal

Key Edicts: have compassion for those around you, cooperate to achieve a goal, compromise with others

Key Anathema: initiate combat, break a truce, provoke another

Sewa.name: Sewa
Sewa.description:
Alignment: CN (NG, CG, N, CN, NE, CE)

Siblings: Jata and Sumaworo

Temples: inns, gambling halls, thieves' guilds

Worshipperst: gamblers, thieves, spies, performers

Sacred Animal: spider

Sacred Colors: gray and green

Domains: freedom, luck, magic, trickery

Cleric Spells: 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}, 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BoA00y45uDlmou07]{Secret Chest}

Favored Weapon: rapier

Divine Ability: Dexterity or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Stealth

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: have fun, make people laugh, mess around and find out

Key Anathema: take a solemn vow, take things too seriously, refuse to indulge your curiosity

Than Dat.name: Than Dat
Than Dat.description:
Alignment: NG (LG, NG, CG, N)

Siblings: Thongfa, Mului, Baoyan, and Kuu

Temples: caves, low roads, mountain tops

Worshipperst: farmers, druids

Sacred Animal: mole

Sacred Colors: brown and green

Domains: earth, family, healing, nature

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Rn2LkoSq1XhLsODV]{Pummeling Rubble}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.McnPlLFvKtQVXNcG]{Shape Stone}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Earthquake}

Favored Weapon: maul

Divine Ability: Constitution or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Nature

Divine Font: heal

Key Edicts: care for the land, be kind to animals, nurture your family

Key Anathema: harm a plant or animal without need, poison the land, harm a natural wonder

Thongfa.name: Thongfa
Thongfa.description:
Alignment: CN (CG, N, CN, CE)

Siblings: Mului, Than Dat, Baoyan, and Kuu

Temples: mountaintops, sailing ships, windmills

Worshipperst: sailors, farmers, millers, travelers

Sacred Animal: common swift

Sacred Colors: sky blue and white

Domains: air, change, luck, travel

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JyT346VmGtRLsDnV]{Lightning Storm}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8hKW4mWQyLnkHVta]{Whirlwind}

Favored Weapon: longbow

Divine Ability: Dexterity or Charisma

Divine Skill: Acrobatics

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: seek out new experiences, explore, travel

Key Anathema: willingly restrain yourself, become stagnant, take the wind out of another's dreams

Tova.name: Tova
Tova.description:
Alignment: LN (LG, LN, LE)

Siblings: Unknown

Temples: bureaucratic buildings, courts, guard outposts, libraries

Worshipperst: lawmakers, politicians, architects

Sacred Animal: alpaca

Sacred Colors: blue with white

Domains: cities, knowledge, perfection, truth

Cleric Spells: 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rVANhQgB8Uqi9PTl]{Animate Rope}, 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.m4Mc5XbdML92BKOE]{Strange Geometry}, 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uEyfLoFQsRKBRIcB]{Scintillating Pattern}

Favored Weapon: gauntlet

Divine Ability: Intelligence or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Society

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: create systems of order wherever you can, obey all local laws even if only to the letter, create for yourself a strong moral code

Key Anathema: knowingly break laws, create chaos in an organized system, intentionally defy social expectations

Wera.name: Wera
Wera.description:
Alignment: LN (LG, LN, N, LE)

Siblings: Chakisa, Kasa, and Chira

Temples: farms, marketplaces, workshops

Worshipperst: farmers, merchants, butchers, crafters, engineers

Sacred Animal: beaver

Sacred Colors: red with yellow

Domains: death, duty, family, toil

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Barkskin}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mwPfoYfVGSMAaUec]{Cozy Cabin}

Favored Weapon: scythe

Divine Ability: Strength or Intelligence

Divine Skill: Crafting

Divine Font: harm or heal

Key Edicts: work hard, do your duty, show respect for your community

Key Anathema: deceive others, procrastinate today's tasks until later, shirk responsibility

Zatera.name: Zatera
Zatera.description:
Alignment: NE (N, LE, NE, CE)

Siblings: Semelleh

Temples: battlefields, military encampments, tournaments

Worshipperst: soldiers, weaponsmiths, merchants

Sacred Animal: raptor

Sacred Colors: silver and red

Domains: ambition, might, destruction, zeal

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jsWthW1Qy6tg3SwD]{Draw Ire}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hoR6w8BqX2F35Tdx]{Blistering Invective}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8M03UxGXjYyDFAoy]{Weapon Storm}

Favored Weapon: longspear

Divine Ability: Strength or Constitution

Divine Skill: Intimidation

Divine Font: harm

Key Edicts: fight for what you believe in, take what you deserve, outwit your enemies

Key Anathema: go easy on an opponent, yield when you are right, willingly flee

Zoa.name: Zoa
Zoa.description:
Alignment: LN (LG, LN, N, LE)

Siblings: Aoz

Temples: graveyards, mortuaries, battlefields, tombs

Worshipperst: morticians, gravediggers, soldiers

Sacred Animal: caterpillar

Sacred Colors: black and gray

Domains: darkness, death, fate, nightmares

Cleric Spells: 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.k34hDOfIIMAxNL4a]{Grim Tendrils}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AMEu5zzLN7uCX645]{Ghostly Weapon}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ht35SDf9PDStJfoC]{Spirit Song}

Favored Weapon: sickle

Divine Ability: Constitution or Wisdom

Divine Skill: Religion

Divine Font: harm

Key Edicts: respect the dead and their resting place, accept the inevitability of death, destroy undead

Key Anathema: return the dead to life, create undead, disturb the dead's rest
